record.description: [University of Chicago president Robert Hutchins made sweeping changes with regard to increasing the educational value of the college experience. The cartoon appeared in the Chicago Tribune shortly after he abolished football at the University of Chicago, abandoning athletics in support of academics. Cartoonist John T. McCutcheon inscribed it to Robert M. Hutchins with best wishes. Photographic copy of drawing.]
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
